result.title: I need a favor from Indian ACM ICPC 2016 World Finalists
result.content:
I'll be very brief so you don't have to read a lot.

I'm looking for this book (http://www.amazon.in/gp/offer-listing/8120340078/ref=tmm_pap_new_olp_sr?ie=UTF8&condition=new&qid=1461272382&sr=8-1) and I can't get it in my home country because they don't sell it here and it's forbidden to import things in my country shipping them from abroad.

I'll go to the World Finals this year and in Amazon India it's half the price as in any other site, but they only ship to India. If anyone can bring me a copy of this book to the World Finals I'm willing to pay 20 US Dollars for each copy (up to 6 copies, if more than one people can take me one copy).

I'd really appreciate it as this book is very important for me!
